column1: You are perhaps considering counseling or consulting at this point because either you have been dealing with a tough situation
column3: or you are doing well but would love to feel even better
column4: more satisfied with your life. I work with career professionals and leaders on anxiety and mood problems as well as other issues such as life transitions

column3: and using elements of lifestyle that we know from research contribute to our health. I work mostly from a brief therapy

column1: As a registered psychologist with a PhD in Counselling Psychology and an MBA
column2: I have worked in senior management
column3: private and public sectors and on boards. My clients say that I not only have technical expertise
column4: but I "really get" what they're going through from the business perspective.
